Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Seniors really pack a punch, don't they?

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: The key to this fight is superior defensive cover. Remember this is vital.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: You should also keep in mind that movement costs differs between units. Seniors have an easier time getting through difficult terrain. Try getting to cover before they get to you.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Focus on what you've learned, and victory will be yours!
